segments.text: Excuse me . We ordered too much . May we take the food home ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do I have to pay extra charge for that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you don't . It is free of charge .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , then , will you put this and that into doggie bags ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , would you wait for a few minutes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Would you give me another favor ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Some more Chinese tea for us , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I'll be back in a minute .
segments.speaker: S2
